features.name: Reactivity
features.description: Tracks and manages updates to an array of ActiveObject instances.

features.name: Debouncing
features.description: Minimizes frequent updates to the state by debouncing calls, improving performance.

features.name: Membrane Integration
features.description: Uses the `arrayMembrane` function to wrap and manage reactivity for the array entities.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Leverages React's useState hook to maintain the reactive state of the array.

features.name: Callbacks Support
features.description: Allows updates to array values using callback functions, ensuring external changes are managed.
